original_text: How much less in them that dwell in houses of clay, whose foundation is in the dust, which are crushed before the moth?
korean_text: 하물며 흙 집에 살며 티끌로 터를 삼고 하루살이 앞에서라도 무너질 자이겠느냐

sentences.original_text: How much less in them that dwell in houses of clay
sentences.korean_translation: 진흙 집에 사는 사람들에게는 얼마나 더 적겠는가

sentences.original_text: whose foundation is in the dust
which are crushed before the moth
